How to take screenshot on Asus Zenfone 3 Using the hardware keys
Taking a screenshot using hardware keys is the most common way of capturing screenshot on any Android smartphone which works on this device as well.

items: Go to the screen on which you want to take the screenshot.
Press and hold volume down and power button simultaneously.

How to take screenshot on Asus Zenfone 3 Using the screenshot button
For capturing the screenshot using this method, you need to customise in the quick settings option. This is one time settings.

content.alt: How to take screenshot on Asus Zenfone 3 Using the screenshot button

items: Go to quick setting options which you can access by swiping down on the home screen.
Now tap on to edit(2nd icon from the top right).
Under "Select tools to show on quick settings panel", enable "screenshot" by dragging it.
As you can select only 4 tools, you might need to disable any of one of the currently showing tool.
Now whenever you want to take screenshot, go to quick settings panel and tap on to screenshot button.
Taken screenshots will be saved in phone gallery automatically.
